To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Trix _trix;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_trix = TRIX(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_trix.IsReady)
{
    var current = _trix.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.trix = self.TRIX(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.trix.IsReady:
    current = self.trix.Current.Value
